name: Nidhaan Dubey
title: Final-year B.Tech Computer Science student at the Indian Institute of Information Technology(IIIT), Sonepat
description: I have strong foundation in full-stack development, machine learning, and problem-solving.I’ve built and deployed real-world applications using React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and Python, and contributed to scalable, production-ready modules during my internship at FACT-APP. On the ML front, I’m actively working on projects like low-light image enhancement and have hands-on experience with key libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and scikit-learn for data analysis and model development. With over 600+ DSA problems solved and a 1600+ LeetCode rating

projects.title: OS Scheduling Algorithms

projects.description: Engineered a responsive website with React, Node, and Bootstrap using a News API for real-time updates.
